languages.text: {n}Гордей трет бородку в задумчивости.{/n} "Да, нынешний вид Футфола — трущобы, сплавленные в одно целое с остатками величественных дворцов, — это нечто уникальное. Было бы интересно понаблюдать, породило ли оно подражания, стало ли новым стилем в архитектуре, или так и осталось местным курьезным феноменом? А вы умеете смотреть на вещи с неожиданной стороны!"

{n}Gordei strokes his goatee in thought.{/n} "Yes, Footfall's current appearance — slums fused together with the remains of majestic palaces — is a unique phenomenon. It would be curious to observe if other places have taken after it, thereby solidifying it as a new style of architecture, or if it still remains a local oddity. My word, you certainly know how to provide an unexpected perspective on things!"
languages.original_text: {n}Гордей трет бородку в задумчивости.{/n} "Да, нынешний вид Футфола — трущобы, сплавленные в одно целое с остатками величественных дворцов, — это нечто уникальное. Было бы интересно понаблюдать, породило ли оно подражания, стало ли новым стилем в архитектуре, или так и осталось местным курьезным феноменом? А вы умеете смотреть на вещи с неожиданной стороны!"

It would be curious to observe if other places have taken after it, thereby solidifying it as a new style of architecture, or if it still remains a local oddity. My word, you certainly know how to provide an unexpected perspective on things!"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian

languages.text: {n}ゴルデイはあごひげを撫でながら考え込んだ。{/n}「ええ、スラム街と壮大な宮廷の名残が融合した現在のフットフォールの姿は不思議な現象だと言えます。他の地域がこの建築様式に倣い、新しい建築様式として定着したのか、それともまだこの地域の変わり種として残っているのか、興味深いところです。いやはや、あなたに話したことで予想外の視点を得られましたよ！」
languages.original_text: {n}Gordei strokes his goatee in thought.{/n} "Yes, Footfall's current appearance — slums fused together with the remains of majestic palaces — is a unique phenomenon. It would be curious to observe if other places have taken after it, thereby solidifying it as a new style of architecture, or if it still remains a local oddity. My word, you certainly know how to provide an unexpected perspective on things!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ゴルデイはあごひげを撫でながら考え込んだ。{/n}「ええ、スラム街と壮大な宮廷の名残が融合した現在のフットフォールの姿は不思議な現象だと言えます。他の地域がこの建築様式に倣い、新しい建築様式として定着したのか、それともまだこの地域の変わり種として残っているのか、興味深いところです。いやはや、あなたに話したことで予想外の視点を得られましたよ！」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian

languages.text: {n}戈尔代抚摸着他的山羊胡，沉思起来。{/n}“没错，落脚港目前的面貌，贫民窟与宏伟宫殿的遗迹融合在了一起，这确实是独特的现象。如果其他地区进行效仿，是否由此演变成新的建筑风格？还是说，这种古怪的风格只此一家，别无分号？这会成为一个有趣的命题。我的天，您真的很擅长从意想不到的视角看待事物！”
languages.original_text: {n}Gordei strokes his goatee in thought.{/n} "Yes, Footfall's current appearance — slums fused together with the remains of majestic palaces — is a unique phenomenon. It would be curious to observe if other places have taken after it, thereby solidifying it as a new style of architecture, or if it still remains a local oddity. My word, you certainly know how to provide an unexpected perspective on things!"

traits.locale_text: {n}戈尔代抚摸着他的山羊胡，沉思起来。{/n}“没错，落脚港目前的面貌，贫民窟与宏伟宫殿的遗迹融合在了一起，这确实是独特的现象。如果其他地区进行效仿，是否由此演变成新的建筑风格？还是说，这种古怪的风格只此一家，别无分号？这会成为一个有趣的命题。我的天，您真的很擅长从意想不到的视角看待事物！”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian

languages.text: {n}Gordei se acaricia la perilla con aire pensativo.{/n} «Sí, la configuración actual de Paso, dispuesta en barriadas que se mezclan con los restos de majestuosos palacios, es un fenómeno único. Sería curioso observar si existen otros lugares que exhiban la misma disposición, consolidándose así como un nuevo estilo arquitectónico, o si sigue siendo una rareza local. Vaya, ¡sí que sabe usted buscarle tres pies al gato!».
languages.original_text: {n}Gordei strokes his goatee in thought.{/n} "Yes, Footfall's current appearance — slums fused together with the remains of majestic palaces — is a unique phenomenon. It would be curious to observe if other places have taken after it, thereby solidifying it as a new style of architecture, or if it still remains a local oddity. My word, you certainly know how to provide an unexpected perspective on things!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Gordei se acaricia la perilla con aire pensativo.{/n} «Sí, la configuración actual de Paso, dispuesta en barriadas que se mezclan con los restos de majestuosos palacios, es un fenómeno único. Sería curioso observar si existen otros lugares que exhiban la misma disposición, consolidándose así como un nuevo estilo arquitectónico, o si sigue siendo una rareza local. Vaya, ¡sí que sabe usted buscarle tres pies al gato!».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian

languages.text: {n}Gordei se caresse le bouc en réfléchissant.{/n} « Il est vrai que l'apparence actuelle de Castel, avec ses taudis mélangés aux vestiges de palais majestueux, est unique en son genre. Il serait intéressant de savoir si d'autres endroits s'en sont inspirés, validant ainsi un style architectural d'un genre nouveau, ou si cela reste une exception locale. En tout cas, vous savez donner une perspective inattendue aux choses, vous ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Gordei strokes his goatee in thought.{/n} "Yes, Footfall's current appearance — slums fused together with the remains of majestic palaces — is a unique phenomenon. It would be curious to observe if other places have taken after it, thereby solidifying it as a new style of architecture, or if it still remains a local oddity. My word, you certainly know how to provide an unexpected perspective on things!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Gordei se caresse le bouc en réfléchissant.{/n} « Il est vrai que l'apparence actuelle de Castel, avec ses taudis mélangés aux vestiges de palais majestueux, est unique en son genre. Il serait intéressant de savoir si d'autres endroits s'en sont inspirés, validant ainsi un style architectural d'un genre nouveau, ou si cela reste une exception locale. En tout cas, vous savez donner une perspective inattendue aux choses, vous ! »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian

languages.text: {n}Gordei streicht nachdenklich über seinen Ziegenbart.{/n} "Ja, der aktuelle Zustand von Footfall – mit den Überresten majestätischer Paläste verschmolzene Slums – ist ein einzigartiges Phänomen. Es wäre interessant, herauszufinden, ob es das woanders auch gibt, quasi wie ein neuer architektonischer Stil, oder ob es eine lokale Kuriosität geblieben ist. Ich muss sagen, Ihr wisst wirklich, wie man Dinge in eine unerwartete Perspektive rückt!"
languages.original_text: {n}Gordei strokes his goatee in thought.{/n} "Yes, Footfall's current appearance — slums fused together with the remains of majestic palaces — is a unique phenomenon. It would be curious to observe if other places have taken after it, thereby solidifying it as a new style of architecture, or if it still remains a local oddity. My word, you certainly know how to provide an unexpected perspective on things!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Gordei streicht nachdenklich über seinen Ziegenbart.{/n} "Ja, der aktuelle Zustand von Footfall – mit den Überresten majestätischer Paläste verschmolzene Slums – ist ein einzigartiges Phänomen. Es wäre interessant, herauszufinden, ob es das woanders auch gibt, quasi wie ein neuer architektonischer Stil, oder ob es eine lokale Kuriosität geblieben ist. Ich muss sagen, Ihr wisst wirklich, wie man Dinge in eine unerwartete Perspektive rückt!"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian

languages.text: {n}Gordei, düşünceli düşünceli çene sakalını okşuyor.{/n} "Evet, Binliman'ın şu anki görüntüsü, gecekonduların haşmetli saraylarla kaynaşması, eşi benzeri görülmemiş bir olay. Acaba başka yerlerde de bu akıma kapılanlar olmuş mudur? Böylece yeni bir mimari tarz ortaya çıkmış mıdır, yoksa bu durum sadece buraya has bir acayiplik midir? Vay canına! Duruma beklenmedik açıdan bakmayı iyi bildiğiniz belli!"
languages.original_text: {n}Gordei strokes his goatee in thought.{/n} "Yes, Footfall's current appearance — slums fused together with the remains of majestic palaces — is a unique phenomenon. It would be curious to observe if other places have taken after it, thereby solidifying it as a new style of architecture, or if it still remains a local oddity. My word, you certainly know how to provide an unexpected perspective on things!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Gordei, düşüncelere dalıp çene sakalını okşuyor.{/n} "Evet, Binliman'da şu an olduğu gibi gecekondularla heybetli sarayların tek parça hâline gelmesi, eşi benzeri görülmemiş bir olay. Acaba başka yerlerde de bu akıma kapılanlar olmuş mudur? Böylece yeni bir mimari tarzı ortaya çıkmış mıdır, yoksa bu durum sadece buraya özel bir acayiplik mi? Amanın, gerçekten de duruma beklenmedik bir bakış açısından yaklaşmakta sizin gibisi yok!"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian
